context_bundle.summary: Rust ownership system - the three rules, move semantics, borrowing, references, and lifetimes.

onboarding.quick_start: Three rules: 1) Each value has one owner, 2) Only one owner at a time, 3) Value dropped when owner goes out of scope. Use & for borrow, &mut for mutable borrow.
common_patterns: let s2 = s1; // MOVE - s1 invalid
let s2 = s1.clone(); // CLONE - both valid
let r = &s; // BORROW - s still valid
let r = &mut s; // MUTABLE BORROW - exclusive
known_errors: E0382: Use of moved value - clone or use references
